column5: I'm just started to fish for Muskies and didn't want to have a huge box for 50 lures and don't think i will buy that many, so i made my own total cost $12.00,the box was on sale. Here are the pics.   Box $2.00    Square tubing $10.00/10' Cut to 10"    Grooved on table saw 3/16"    Final prouduct
Awesome...  A file folder box from Staples?

Looking good but here's a thought. You should have left over material, enough for 10 2" sections... stagger the tubes and use the 2" sections as spacers. Use the left over tubes to make a third row.  tube - spacer - tube - spacer - tube spacer - tube - spacer - tube - spacer tube - spacer - tube - spacer - tube
where did you get the box for $2?

Got the box at Staples,it was on clearance for $2.00    I thought about making it that way but didn't have enough surface to glue the tubing together.I kept some space to store pliers,gloves and other stuff.
